message: Let's split the money 60/40. It's a fair deal considering the inflation working against us.
I think 60/40 is a better split, considering the inflation will hit you harder than me. Let's get this done!

Okay, Bob, how about a compromise? 55/45 seems fair considering the time pressure and inflation.
